metadata.title: In Integrum – Bošany Castle
metadata.description: Renaissance Bošany Castle - a place where history comes back to life. Weddings, conferences, gallery and cultural events.

hero.title: In Integrum
hero.subtitle: Bošany Castle: Restored Heritage
hero.motto: History should not be preserved. It should be brought back to life.

phoenix.title: 17 years of resilience and restoration
phoenix.description: Drag and reveal the story of rescue.

chronicle.title: Where Maria Theresa Slept
chronicle.subtitle: A story spanning five centuries
chronicle.description: From Turkish raids in the 16th century, through the famous visit of the empress, to complete devastation and rebirth. Bošany Castle is a witness to history that refused to be forgotten.

grant.title: Built against all odds
grant.description: Without state support. From the pure determination of one family.

interior.title: Photo Gallery
interior.description: Discover the beauty of the Renaissance castle through the lens. Interiors, exteriors and the atmosphere of history.

exterior.title: Weddings
exterior.description: Your day in a Renaissance park, under the castle towers.

park.title: Life in the Park
park.description: We are not a museum behind glass. Our park is a promenade for the public and home to our unconventional residents.

cellar.title: Wine Cellar
cellar.description: Discover the history of tanning in the Šmídov family crypt or taste wine in a former prison.

footer.motto: Where history is not preserved, but brought back to life.

hero.title: Castle Story
hero.subtitle: Five centuries of history, 17 years of restoration

philosophy.title: In Integrum Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Air conditioning designed 400 years ago
philosophy.description: A meter of stone for your perfect comfort. We reject polystyrene and modern insulation. The thick castle walls provide natural climate - pleasant coolness in summer, warmth in winter.

hero.title: Weddings & Celebrations
hero.subtitle: Your big day in Renaissance style

venue.title: Wedding under the towers
venue.description: Polygonal towers, Renaissance park and an atmosphere you won't find anywhere else.

mascots.title: Our residents
mascots.description: Alpacas Boška and Rišo, koi pond - our mascots will welcome you.

hero.title: Spaces & Events
hero.subtitle: Photos of spaces and events at the castle

conference.title: Conference Hall
conference.description: Space for 120 people with modern technical equipment hidden in historical visuals.

culture.title: Cultural Events
culture.description: Vernissages, concerts, discussions - supporting the local social scene.

cellar.title: Wine Cellar
cellar.description: Once a prison, now freedom in wine. Unique spaces for tastings and private events.

privacy.intro: The civic association IN INTEGRUM values your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with GDPR regulations and Slovak data protection laws.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The data controller is the civic association IN INTEGRUM, ID: 42024757, with registered office at SNP 113/1, 956 18 Bošany, Slovak Republic.

data.title: What Data We Collect
data.content:
We collect the following personal data:
• Contact form: name, email, phone, message content
• Newsletter: email address
• Reservation form: name, email, phone, event date

The purpose of processing is to communicate with you, handle your inquiries and send newsletters (only with your consent).

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses only essential technical cookies for proper functioning of the site. We do not use marketing or third-party analytical cookies.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Rectification of incorrect data
• Erasure of data (right to be forgotten)
• Restriction of processing
• Data portability
• Object to processing
• Withdraw consent at any time

contact.title: Contact for Questions
contact.content: If you have any questions regarding the processing of your personal data, contact us at jmiskeje@gmail.com or in writing at the association's registered address.
